keysForContent.note: On demand, I <applicantName> aged <applicantAge> years,  residing at <applicantAddress> and  <coApplicantName>aged  <coApplicantAge> years, residing at <coApplicantAddress> jointly and severally promise to pay CreditAccess Grameen Limited (CA Grameen), or order a sum of Rs.<sanctionedAmount> (Rupees <sanctionedAmountInWords> only) with interest @ <rateOfInterest> percent per annum on the sanctioned amount on account of the consideration received.
